com.google.code.sagetvaddons.sjq.network
Class AgentClient

java.lang.Object
  ListenerClient
      com.google.code.sagetvaddons.sjq.network.AgentClient

public final class AgentClient
extends ListenerClient

Provide a connection to a task client agent; allow execution of commands on the task client

            throws java.io.IOException
Construcotr

Parameters:

java.io.IOException - If there is any error connecting to the given task client
Method Detail

ping

public Client ping()
Ping the task client; returns an updated Client instance as provided by the task client

Returns:
The current state of the task client or null if the ping failed

exe

public QueuedTask.State exe(QueuedTask qt)
Assign the given task to the task client

Parameters:
qt - The Task to assign to the client
Returns:
The state of the task, which should be RUNNING if successfully started by the task client

update

public boolean update(Client clnt)
Update the settings on the connected client

Parameters:
clnt - The new settings values for the client
Returns:
True if the setting were updated successfully or false otherwise; the hostname and port settings are never updated and are ignored by the receiving client. You cannot update the host or port settings over the network.

killTask

public boolean killTask(QueuedTask qt)
Kill the given task on the client

Parameters:
qt - The task to kill
Returns:
True on success or false otherwise; false will be returned in case of any error, including if the client is not running the give task

killAll

public void killAll()
Kill all the running tasks on the client

isTaskActive

public boolean isTaskActive(QueuedTask qt)
Ask the client if it's running the given task

Parameters:
qt - The task to query about
Returns:
True if the client is running the given task or false otherwise
